name: My Summer Car Fix: Auto Mechanic Simulator Full
name_original: My Summer Car Fix: Auto Mechanic Simulator Full
description:
Ever dreamed about owning a little car repairing service station? It’s time for your dreams to come true now! Run your own service station and become the best manager ever in My Summer Car Fix: Auto Mechanic Simulator!
Be ready to work fast and accurate not to disturb your clients! Mind that every damaged car is unique, so find proper details to fix the situation! Be a car-surgeon and heal up even the most hopeless ‘patients’!
Master your car repairing skills and gain the best reputation in the neighborhood! Roll up your sleeves and do your best to finish all your fixes in time! Use appropriate tools to change the oil, make an engine dismounting, upgrade gas pump or steering wheel and remember – there is also a room for improvement! Become the real pro in car repairing and have fun with My Summer Car Fix: Auto Mechanic Simulator!
Don’t forget to be really attentive and careful and keep your fire extinguisher alert! Earn money for each successfully done mission and level up your service station from a little garage to a large car fix place!
My Summer Car Fix: Auto Mechanic Simulator features:
• Interesting car mechanic simulator
• Addictive gameplay
• Wide range of cars to repair
• Different missions and challenges
• Simple and intuitive controls
• Realistic workshop environment
Dip into the interesting work of service station manager! Fix cars, earn money and level your repairing skills up with My Summer Car Fix: Auto Mechanic Simulator!
